html: That's why today, @DonaldNorcross, @RepBonamici and I introduced the Women's Pension Protection Act. The bill improves spousal access to retirement plans, makes more long-term and part-time workers eligible for retirement plans, and improves financial literacy.
text: That's why today, @DonaldNorcross, @RepBonamici and I introduced the Women's Pension Protection Act. The bill improves spousal access to retirement plans, makes more long-term and part-time workers eligible for retirement plans, and improves financial literacy.

html: As we work to win full equality for women in America, we cannot overlook the retirement gap. Because they are much more likely to earn less than their male counterparts, women in America typically have far less money saved up for retirement.

html: Today is National Heatstroke Prevention Day. So far in 2018, twenty-nine young lives have been lost to heatstroke inside vehicles. That’s nearly one life lost every week. We cannot allow this quiet epidemic to continue, especially as these tragedies are preventable.
text: Today is National Heatstroke Prevention Day. So far in 2018, twenty-nine young lives have been lost to heatstroke inside vehicles. That’s nearly one life lost every week. We cannot allow this quiet epidemic to continue, especially as these tragedies are preventable.
